name: Solarflare
description:
You're flying a ship in space, you know what to do. Try to beat the developer's best score of 1800.

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to fire
  • X to dodge

Increase your combo multiplier by destroying enemies and avoiding damage. The higher the multiplier, the more points awarded for destroying enemies.


Attribution
  • Thanks to Nick Preheim for all of the art used in the game. Be sure to check out his other work!
  • Music by Bio Unit. Track featured: "No-one around". Licensed via CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.
